name: On my Own (itch) (Mysteora)
description:
Game made for the global game jam 2022 Thème: Duality

You play as a child which have found an artifact that enabled him to manipulate time. The player is able to record his actions, and generate a copy of himself redoing what he did in the past. He must use his newly acquired powers to progress and regain his freedom.

How to play:
  • q : move left
  • d : move right
  • space : jump
  • hold o : record
  • p : replay
Contributors:

Mysteora : programming, 3D modeling, level design
Platypus : 3d modeling, level design, animations
Nicnl : programming, level design, music
